Package de.fourzerofournotfound.rateyourstuff.rays.controllers.media

Class PlatformController

java.lang.Object
de.fourzerofournotfound.rateyourstuff.rays.controllers.media.PlatformController
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/rest/platforms")
public class PlatformController
extends java.lang.Object
Platform Controller

This Controller provides basic REST Interfaces to interact with Platform entities from the database

Author:
Christoph Frischmuth, John Klippstein, Mickey Knop, Robin Beck

    • PlatformController

      @Autowired public PlatformController​(PlatformRepository repository, PlatformService platformService, PageableService pageableService)

  • Method Details

    • getAll

      @GetMapping("/all") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<PlatformDto>> getAll​(@RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="50") int size, @RequestParam(defaultValue="") java.lang.String orderBy, @RequestParam(defaultValue="asc") java.lang.String order)
      This Method returns all platforms from the database
      Parameters:
      page - the current page (optional)
      size - the number of items per page
      orderBy - the attributed that should be ordered
      order - the order (asc, desc)
      Returns:
      a list of PlatformDTOs

    • getById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<PlatformDto> getById​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long id) throws PlatformNotFoundException
      This method is used to get a single Platform by its id
      Parameters:
      id - the if of the platform
      Returns:
      the found platform DTO
      Throws:
      PlatformNotFoundException - if there is no platform with the given id
